TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AccessDataSource extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource

summary.span: 表示与数据绑定控件结合使用的 Microsoft Access 数据库。

span.span: Represents a Microsoft Access database for use with data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是与 Microsoft Access 数据库一起使用的数据源控件。The class is a data source control that works with Microsoft Access databases. 与它的基类一样，， 控件使用 SQL 查询来执行数据检索。Like its base class, , the control uses SQL queries to perform data retrieval. 控件的唯一特征之一是不设置 属性。One of the unique characteristics of the control is that you do not set the property. 只需在 "" 属性中设置 Access （.mdb）文件的位置， 会处理数据库的基础连接。All you need to do is set the location of the Access (.mdb) file in the property and the takes care of the underlying connection to the database. 应将 Access 数据库放置在网站的 App_Data 目录中，并通过相对路径引用这些数据库（例如，`~/App_Data/Northwind.mdb`）。You should place Access databases in the App_Data directory of the Web site and reference them by a relative path (for example, `~/App_Data/Northwind.mdb`). 此位置为数据文件提供了额外的安全性，因为它们不是由客户端 Web 浏览器直接请求的。This location offers additional security for data files, because they are not served if they are requested directly by the client Web browser. 类不支持连接到受用户名或密码保护的 Access 数据库，因为无法设置 属性。The class does not support connecting to Access databases that are protected by a user name or password, because you cannot set the property. 如果访问数据库受用户名或密码保护，请使用 控件连接到该数据库，以便可以指定完整的连接字符串。If your Access database is protected by a user name or password, use the control to connect to it so that you can specify a complete connection string. 使用数据绑定控件的 `DataSourceID` 属性将数据绑定控件绑定到 。You bind data-bound controls to an using the `DataSourceID` property of the data-bound control. 有关将数据绑定控件绑定到数据源控件的详细信息，请参阅[使用数据源控件绑定到数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e41adfff-8fb8-449e-9cd1-9bd49788c5f7)。For more information about binding a data-bound control to data source controls, see [Binding to Data Using a Data Source Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e41adfff-8fb8-449e-9cd1-9bd49788c5f7). 因为 控件仅特定于一个数据库产品，所以它始终使用同一个提供程序- .NET 数据访问接口。Because the control is specific to only one database product, it always uses the same provider - the .NET data provider. 出于此原因， 属性是只读的。For this reason, the property is read-only. 使用 提供程序时，参数化的 SQL 语句中参数的顺序很重要;在 、、和 属性中指定的任何参数化 SQL 查询都必须与相应参数集合中任何 对象的顺序相匹配。When using the provider, the order of the parameters in a parameterized SQL statement is significant; any parameterized SQL queries that you specify in the , , , and properties must match the order of any objects that are in the corresponding parameter collection. 如果 上未指定参数集合，则提供给这些操作的参数的顺序必须与它们在基础 SQL 语句中出现的顺序一致。If no parameter collection is specified on the , the order of parameters that are supplied to these operations must match the order in which they appear in the underlying SQL statement. 有关详细信息，请参阅[将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). 控件支持其基类支持的相同缓存行为。The control supports the same caching behavior that its base class supports. 使用缓存来提高使用 控件的页面的性能。Use caching to increase the performance of pages that use the control. 有关数据源缓存的详细信息，请参阅[使用数据源控件缓存数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8f534a06-3136-4048-bb2e-6563a8238d15)。For more information about data source caching, see [Caching Data Using Data Source Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8f534a06-3136-4048-bb2e-6563a8238d15). 下表描述了 控件的功能。The following table describes the features of the control. |功能Capability|要求Requirements| |----------------|------------------| |排序Sorting|将 属性设置为 值。Set the property to the value.| |FilteringFiltering|将 属性设置为一个筛选表达式，该表达式用于在调用 方法时筛选数据。Set the property to a filtering expression used to filter the data when the method is called.| |PagingPaging| 不支持对 Access 数据库进行直接分页操作。The does not support direct paging operations on an Access database. 如果 属性设置为 值，则数据绑定控件（如 ）可以对 返回的项进行分页。A data-bound control, such as the , can page over the items returned by the , if the property is set to the value.| |更新Updating|将 属性设置为用于更新数据的 SQL 语句。Set the property to a SQL statement used to update data. 此语句通常是参数化的。This statement is typically parameterized.| |正在删除Deleting|将 属性设置为用于删除数据的 SQL 语句。Set the property to a SQL statement used to delete data. 此语句通常是参数化的。This statement is typically parameterized.| |插入Inserting|将 属性设置为用于插入数据的 SQL 语句。Set the property to a SQL statement used to insert data. 此语句通常是参数化的。This statement is typically parameterized.| |CachingCaching|根据缓存数据所需的缓存行为，将 属性设置为 值，将 属性设置为 `true`，并将 和 属性设置为。Set the property to the value, the property to `true`, and the and properties according to the caching behavior you want for your cached data.| 与所有数据源控件一样， 控件与强类型化数据源视图类相关联。As with all data source controls, the control is associated with a strongly typed data source view class. 正如 控件扩展 控件一样， 类将扩展 类。Just as the control extends the control, the class extends the class. 类将重写几个 方法以使用 .NET 数据访问接口。The class overrides a few of the methods to use the .NET data provider. 没有 控件的可视呈现;它作为控件实现，以实现声明性持久性，并允许（可选）参与状态管理。There is no visual rendering of the control; it is implemented as a control to enable declarative persistence and to permit, optionally, participation in state management. 因此，不能设置支持视觉功能的属性，例如 和 属性。As a result, you cannot set properties that support visual features, such as the and properties. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个带有 控件的常见显示和更新方案。The following code example demonstrates a common display and update scenario with the control. 属性设置为相应的 SQL 查询，Northwind 数据库中的数据将显示在 控件中。The property is set to an appropriate SQL query, and data from the Northwind database is displayed in the control. 由于还指定了 属性，并且 属性设置为 `true`，因此你可以在不使用其他代码的情况下编辑和更新记录。Because a property is also specified and the property is set to `true`, you can edit and update the records with no additional code. 控件处理向 集合添加参数的句柄; 控件首先传递 对象的参数值，后跟 属性所指定的字段的值。The control handles adding parameters to the collection; the control passes the parameter values for the objects first, followed by the values of fields that are specified by the property. 自动调用 方法。The calls the method automatically. 如果要对参数进行显式排序，请在 上指定 集合。If you want to order the parameters, explicitly, specify an collection on the . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_5access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_5access/CS/access5cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_5access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_5access/VB/access5vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取用来连接到 Microsoft Access 数据库的连接字符串。

span.span: Gets the connection string that is used to connect to the Microsoft Access database.

value.span: 通过 .NET 数据提供程序，用于连接到 Access 数据库的 控件的 OLE DB 连接字符串。

span.span: The OLE DB connection string that the control uses to connect to an Access database, through the .NET data provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件只能与 .NET 数据提供程序一起使用，而 使用的连接字符串特定于此提供程序。The control can be used only with the .NET data provider, and the connection string that uses is specific to this provider. 因此， 控件将连接字符串设置（如 属性）作为属性公开，并使用 属性的值在运行时构造连接字符串（如果已设置）。Therefore, the control exposes connection string settings, such as the property, as a property and constructs a connection string at run time using the values of the property, if set. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 ASP.NET 网页中显示 控件的 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to display the property of the control in an ASP.NET Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_24access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_24access/CS/access24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_24access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_24access/VB/access24vb.aspx#1)]

member this.DataFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 Microsoft Access .mdb 文件的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of the Microsoft Access .mdb file.
The location of the Access .mdb file.

value.span: 支持绝对路径、相对路径和虚拟路径。

span.span: Absolute, relative, and virtual paths are supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是 控件表示的 Access .mdb 文件的虚拟、绝对或 UNC 目录路径。The property is a virtual, absolute, or UNC directory path to the Access .mdb file that the control represents. 如果只输入文件的名称，则表示在当前正在执行的 Web 窗体页或代码所在的同一目录中找到 .mdb 文件。If only the name of the file is entered, this indicates that the .mdb file is found in the same directory as the currently executing Web Forms page or code. 支持带有正斜杠和反斜杠的相对路径。Relative paths with both forward and backward slashes are supported. 例如，`"./test/test/Northwind.mdb"` 映射到与 `".\test\test\Northwind.mdb"` 和 `"test/test/Northwind.mdb"`相同的路径。For example, `"./test/test/Northwind.mdb"` maps to the same path as `".\test\test\Northwind.mdb"` and `"test/test/Northwind.mdb"`. 还支持 UNC 路径，如 `"\\mymachine\somedatadirectory\Northwind.mdb"`。UNC paths, such as `"\\mymachine\somedatadirectory\Northwind.mdb"`, are also supported. 尽管支持绝对物理路径，但应避免使用它们，因为它们会使部署复杂化。Although absolute physical paths are supported, you should avoid using them because they can complicate deployment. ## 配置 Access 数据库的权限Configuring Permissions for an Access Database 使用 Access .mdb 文件的一个重要方面是正确配置权限。An important aspect of working with an Access .mdb file is to configure permissions properly. 当 Web 应用程序使用 Access 数据库时，应用程序必须具有 .mdb 文件的读取权限，以便它可以访问数据。When a Web application uses an Access database, the application must have Read permission to the .mdb file so that it can access the data. 此外，应用程序必须对包含 .mdb 文件的文件夹具有写入权限。In addition, the application must have Write permission to the folder containing the .mdb file. 需要写入权限，因为 Access 会创建一个扩展名为 .ldb 的附加文件，其中包含有关并发用户的数据库锁的信息。Write permission is required because Access creates an additional file with the extension .ldb in which it maintains information about database locks for concurrent users. .Ldb 文件在运行时创建。The .ldb file is created at run time. 默认情况下，ASP.NET Web 应用程序在名为 ASPNET （适用于 Microsoft Windows 2000 和 Microsoft Windows XP）的本地计算机帐户的上下文中运行，或在网络服务帐户（适用于 Microsoft Windows Server 2003）的上下文中运行。By default, ASP.NET Web applications run in the context of a local machine account called ASPNET (for Microsoft Windows 2000 and Microsoft Windows XP), or in the context of the NETWORK SERVICE account (for Microsoft Windows Server 2003). 例如，对于 Windows 2000 或 Windows XP，如果 Web 服务器名为 MyServer，则 MyServer 计算机上的 ASP.NET 应用程序在本地帐户 MyServer\ASPNET. 的上下文中运行。For example, for Windows 2000 or Windows XP, if the Web server is named MyServer, ASP.NET applications on the MyServer computer run in the context of the local account MyServer\ASPNET. 因此，若要在 ASP.NET Web 应用程序中使用 Access 数据库，必须将包含 Access 数据库的文件夹配置为具有读取和写入权限。Therefore, to use an Access database in an ASP.NET Web application, you must configure the folder containing the Access database to have both Read and Write permissions. 在 Microsoft Visual Web Developer Web 开发工具中创建网站时，Visual Web Developer 会在当前根文件夹下创建一个名为 App_Data 的文件夹。When you create a Web site in the Microsoft Visual Web Developer Web development tool, Visual Web Developer creates a folder named App_Data below the current root folder. 文件夹设计为应用程序数据的存储，包括 Access 数据库。The folder is designed to be a store for application data, including Access databases. ASP.NET 也使用 App_Data 文件夹来存储系统维护的数据库，例如，用于成员身份和角色的数据库。The App_Data folder is also used by ASP.NET to store databases that the system maintains, such as the database for membership and roles. 当 Visual Web Developer 创建 App_Data 文件夹时，它会向 ASPNET 或网络服务用户帐户授予对该文件夹的读取和写入权限。When Visual Web Developer creates the App_Data folder, it grants Read and Write permissions for the folder to the ASPNET or NETWORK SERVICE user account. > [!NOTE] > 作为一种安全措施，Visual Web Developer 还会配置 App_Data 文件夹，以便 Web 服务器不提供文件夹中的文件。As a security measure, Visual Web Developer also configures the App_Data folder so that files in the folder are not served by the Web server. 不要将任何网页存储在 App_Data 文件夹中，因为如果用户从该文件夹请求页面，则会看到错误。Do not store any Web pages in the App_Data folder, because users will see an error if they request a page from that folder. ## Examples 本部分包含三个代码示例。This section contains three code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将 属性设置为与 Web 窗体页驻留在同一目录中的 Northwind .mdb 文件中。The first code example demonstrates how to set the property to a Northwind.mdb file that resides in the same directory as the Web Forms page. 第二个代码示例演示如何将 属性设置为一个 Northwind 文件的虚拟路径，该文件位于名为 Database 的目录下，该目录位于 Web 窗体页所在的目录下。The second code example demonstrates how to set the property to the virtual path of a Northwind.mdb file that resides in a directory named Database, which is beneath the directory that the Web Forms page is in. 第三个代码示例演示如何将 属性设置为 UNC 共享上可用的 Northwind 文件的 UNC 路径。The third code example demonstrates how to set the property to a UNC path of a Northwind.mdb file that is available on a UNC share. 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性设置为与 Web 窗体页位于同一目录中的 Northwind .mdb 文件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to a Northwind.mdb file that resides in the same directory as the Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_4access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_4access/CS/access4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_4access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_4access/VB/access4vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性设置为一个 Northwind 文件的虚拟路径，该文件位于名为 Database 的目录下，该目录位于 Web 窗体页所在的目录下。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to the virtual path of a Northwind.mdb file that resides in a directory named Database, which is beneath the directory that the Web Forms page is in. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_23access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_23access/CS/access23cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_23access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_23access/VB/access23vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性设置为 UNC 共享上可用的 Northwind 文件的 UNC 路径。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to a UNC path of a Northwind.mdb file that is available on a UNC share. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_22access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_22access/CS/access22cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_22access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_22access/VB/access22vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An invalid path was given.

summary.span: 获取用于连接到 Microsoft Access 数据库的 控件的 .NET 数据提供程序的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the .NET data provider that the control uses to connect to a Microsoft Access database.
The string "System.Data.OleDb".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然 控件公开了 属性，因为它继承自其基类，尝试设置 属性会导致 异常。While the control exposes the property because it is inherited from its base class, attempting to set the property results in a exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 Web 窗体页中显示 控件的 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to display the property of the control in a Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_25access#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_25access/CS/access25cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_25access#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource_25access/VB/access25vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property.

span.span: The property overrides the property.
Throws a , in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在基类 中， 属性获取或设置以分号分隔的字符串，该字符串表示要用于 Microsoft SQL Server 缓存依赖项的数据库和表。In the base class, , the property gets or sets a semicolon-delimited string that indicates which databases and tables to use for the Microsoft SQL Server cache dependency. Microsoft Access 不支持缓存依赖关系，对 属性的任何访问都将导致 异常。Cache dependency is not supported by Microsoft Access, and any access to the property results in a exception.

exception.span: 已尝试获取或设置 属性。

span.span: An attempt was made to get or set the property.
